DOC.brief_summary: This study examine whether high protein meal replacement diet ( consist 1 gram protein per pound lean body mass ) effective cause weight loss compare standard meal replacement protein diet ( consist Â½ gram protein per pound lean body mass ) . The study assign approximately 100 subject ( 50 ) follow arm 1 ) high meal replacement diet program 2 ) standard meal replacement diet program . All participant meet registered dietitian provide nutrition education behavior modification , include general exercise recommendation . As part participation , must willing undergo measurement body fat , blood test , willing use Herbalife Meal replacement part diet duration study ( one year ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Protein-Enriched Meal Liver , Kidney Bone : Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: There concern excess protein intake may damage liver , renal function , bone health . This study design compare effect high protein ( HP ) isocaloric meal standard protein ( SP ) weight loss plan liver function , renal function bone metabolism .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 30 year old screen 2 . Female subject must negative pregnancy test screening , must surgically sterile least 6 month postmenopausal must use form birth control measure . Hormonal birth control , IUD , abstinence acceptable birth control measure . Other type birth control condom , diaphragm , sponge may consider adequate form birth control measure study . 3 . BMI 27 40 kg/m2 inclusive . 4 . Subjects must good health determine medical history , physical examination , screen clinical laboratory include chemistry panel CBC . h. Must stable smoking habit ( nonsmoker ) least 6 month prior screen agree intend change habit course study . . Subjects require regular use prescription medication may admit study provide dose stable . j . Ethical Subject must sign Institutional Review Boardapproved write informed consent prior initiation study specific procedure randomization . A subject exclude condition might compromise ability give truly informed consent participation study . 1 . Weight Stability . Any subject report weight change > 3.0 kg month prior screen . 2 . Any subject low calorie diet ( < 800 kcal/day ) period 4 month 12 month prior screen , lose > 10 kg 6 month prior screen . 3 . Use investigational drug ( ) within 8 week prior screen . 4 . Abnormal laboratory parameter : Serum creatinine > 1.6 mg/dl , Liver function test , ALT , AST , Bili result > 2.0 time upper limit normal . Triglycerides > 500 mg/dl , total cholesterol > 350 mg/dl , TSH outside normal range . 5 . Subjects drink 1 alcoholic beverage per day .
